name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: YouTube is planning a "Karate Kid" series that follows the characters 34 years later. The show is entitled "Ralph Macchio's Mortgage Is Due."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In addition to President Trump, it turns out Kim Jong Un also called Putin to congratulate him on his election victory. Putin said afterward, "Wow, I’m hearing from all the crazies."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump is now being sued by a porn star, a reality star, and a Playboy model – or as Trump's evangelical supporters call that, "the holy trinity."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The queen of England is planning a huge concert for her 92nd birthday. The queen made the decision right after finding out Pitbull is available.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: During President Trump's call to Vladimir Putin, he congratulated the Russian leader despite a message from his staff that read "DO NOT CONGRATULATE." Which is why today Melania sent him a message that read "DO NOT DIVORCE."
